mods.abstract: $10 Reward. RAN AWAY from the plantation of Mrs. Widow Valery Roy, near Opelousas, about a month ago, a Negro-Boy named Presley, aged about 24 or 25 years, about 5 feet, 6 inches high ; he is bandy legged, speaks English and a little French. The above reward will be given to whoever will bring him back to the above mentioned plantation, or lodge him in any jail of this State. ALCESTE ROY. Opelousas, 27th May, 1854.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
